code: import{apiKey}from"../api_keys/movieAPI";var apiPath="https://api.themoviedb.org/3/trending/movie/day?api_key=";var imagePath="https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/";var videoPath1="https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/";var videoPath2="/videos?api_key=";var videoLanguage="&language=en-US";var youtubePath="https://www.youtube.com/embed/";export var COMPANY_NAME="GOGIXER";export var ACTION_INVALID="INVALID ACTION";export var NETWORK_ERROR="Network connection error";export var HAMBURGER_CLOSE="hamburger-close";export var HAMBURGER_OPEN="hamburger-open";export var MENU_DEFAULT="menus";export var MOBILE_OPEN="mobile-open";export var MOBILE_CLOSE="mobile-close";export var menus=[{name:"Home",path:"/",id:1},{name:"Blog",path:"/blog",id:2},{name:"Services",path:"/services",id:3},{name:"Shop",path:"/shop",id:4},{name:"Contact Us",path:"/contact",id:5}];export var footer_menus=[{name:"Home",path:"/"},{name:"Blog",path:"/blog"},{name:"Services",path:"/services"},{name:"Shop",path:"/shop"},{name:"About Us",path:"/about"},{name:"Contact Us",path:"/contact"},{name:"Login",path:"/login"}];export var getURL=function getURL(){return apiPath+apiKey;};export var getImagePath=function getImagePath(image){return imagePath+image;};export var getVideoKey=function getVideoKey(movie_id){var videoURL=videoPath1+movie_id+videoPath2+apiKey+videoLanguage;return videoURL;};export var getVideoLink=function getVideoLink(videoKey){var videoURL=youtubePath+videoKey;return videoURL;};
